00024 template <class STDPFunction, class STDPBounds>
00025 class STDPMechConfig
00026         : public ConfigBase
00027         , public STDPFunction
00028         , public STDPBounds
00029 {
00030 public:
00032 
00035     typedef STDPMech<STDPFunction, STDPBounds> related_component;
00036 
00038     MAKE_VISITABLE(STDPMechConfig)
00039 
00040 public:
00041 //  STDPMechConfig(double w_in, double w_out, double tauP, double tauD, double cP, double cD, double cutoffP, double cutoffD, double gmin, double gmax);
00042     STDPMechConfig(std::ifstream & is);
00043     inline const double & cP() const {
00044         return STDPFunction::cP_;
00045     }
00046     inline const double & cD() const {
00047         return STDPFunction::cD_;
00048     }
00049     inline const double & tauP() const {
00050         return STDPFunction::tauP_;
00051     }
00052     inline const double & tauD() const {
00053         return STDPFunction::tauD_;
00054     }
00055     inline const double & cutoffP() const {
00056         return STDPFunction::cutoffP_;
00057     }
00058     inline const double & cutoffD() const {
00059         return STDPFunction::cutoffD_;
00060     }
00061     inline const double & w_in() const {
00062         return w_in_;
00063     }
00064     inline const double & w_out() const {
00065         return w_out_;
00066     }
00067     inline const double & gmin() const {
00068         return STDPBounds::min_;
00069     }
00070     inline const double & gmax() const {
00071         return STDPBounds::max_;
00072     }
00073     inline void weight_change(double & weight, const double & dt) const {
00074         weight += STDPFunction::weight_change_impl(weight, dt);
00075     }
00076     inline void check_bounds(double & weight) const {
00077         STDPBounds::check_bounds_impl(weight);
00078     }
00079 private:
00080     double w_in_, w_out_;
00081 };

00088 template <class STDPFunction, class STDPBounds>
00089 class STDPMech
00090 {
00091 protected:
00092     explicit STDPMech(ConfigBase * const configurator);
00093     template <class TypeImpl> void on_preneuron_fire_plast_update(TypeImpl & neuron, const Time & pre_spike_time);
00094     template <class TypeImpl> void on_postneuron_fire_plast_update(TypeImpl & neuron, const Time & post_spike_time);
00095 private:
00096     const STDPMechConfig<STDPFunction, STDPBounds> * const stdpmcfg_;
00097 };

00107 // STDPMechConfig constructor with script file
00108 template <class STDPFunction, class STDPBounds>
00109 inline STDPMechConfig<STDPFunction, STDPBounds>::STDPMechConfig(std::ifstream & is)
00110 {
00111     std::string test;
00112     double eta;
00113     READ_FROM_FILE(is, eta, "eta", "STDPMechConfig")
00114     READ_FROM_FILE(is, w_in_, "w_in", "STDPMechConfig")
00115     w_in_ *= eta;
00116     READ_FROM_FILE(is, w_out_, "w_out", "STDPMechConfig")
00117     w_out_ *= eta;
00118     double tauP, tauD, cP, cD;
00119     READ_FROM_FILE(is, tauP, "tauP", "STDPMechConfig")
00120     READ_FROM_FILE(is, tauD, "tauD", "STDPMechConfig")
00121     READ_FROM_FILE(is, cP, "cP", "STDPMechConfig")
00122     cP *= eta;
00123     READ_FROM_FILE(is, cD, "cD", "STDPMechConfig")
00124     cD *= -eta;
00125     STDPFunction::set_params(tauP, tauD, cP, cD);
00126     double gmin, gmax;
00127     READ_FROM_FILE(is, gmin, "gmin", "STDPMechConfig")
00128     READ_FROM_FILE(is, gmax, "gmax", "STDPMechConfig")
00129     STDPBounds::set_params(gmin, gmax);
00130 }

00133 // stream operator overloading
00134 template <class STDPFunction, class STDPBounds>
00135 std::ofstream & operator<<(std::ofstream & os, const STDPMechConfig<STDPFunction, STDPBounds> & stdpmcfg)
00136 {
00137     os << " tauP " << stdpmcfg.tauP()
00138     << "; tauD " << stdpmcfg.tauD()
00139     << "; cP " << stdpmcfg.cP()
00140     << "; cD " << stdpmcfg.cD()
00141     << "; cutoffP " << stdpmcfg.cutoffP()
00142     << "; cutoffD " << stdpmcfg.cutoffD()
00143     << "; gmin " << stdpmcfg.gmin()
00144     << "; gmax " << stdpmcfg.gmax()
00145     << ";";
00146     return os;
00147 }

00151 // STDPMech constructor
00152 template <class STDPFunction, class STDPBounds>
00153 inline STDPMech<STDPFunction, STDPBounds>::STDPMech(ConfigBase * const configurator)
00154         : stdpmcfg_(dynamic_cast<STDPMechConfig<STDPFunction, STDPBounds> *>(configurator))
00155 {
00156     if (! stdpmcfg_) throw ConfigError("STDPMech: void configurator");
00157 }

00160 // to update the synaptic weight (passed as a reference) when the preneuron fired
00161 template <class STDPFunction, class STDPBounds>
00162 template <class TypeImpl>
00163 inline void STDPMech<STDPFunction, STDPBounds>::on_preneuron_fire_plast_update(TypeImpl & neuron, const double & pre_spike_time)
00164 {
00165     Time dt;
00166     double pretime = pre_spike_time;
00167     double & weight = neuron.weight_impl();
00168     std::deque<Time>::const_reverse_iterator itend = neuron.postneuron_spike_list_impl().rend();
00169 
00170     // weight change due to firing rate
00171     weight += stdpmcfg_->w_in();
00172 
00173     // Locate the last spike of the postneuron:
00174     std::deque<Time>::const_reverse_iterator posttime_itr = neuron.postneuron_spike_list_impl().rbegin();
00175 
00176     //  check that there IS a last post-spike:
00177     if (posttime_itr == itend)
00178         return;
00179 
00180     // skip the last post-spike if it's later than, or same as, pretime (can only happen once in current timestep):
00181 //  if (*posttime_itr >= pretime)
00182 //      ++posttime_itr; // move backwards
00183 
00184     pretime += neuron.delay_impl(); // add the delay to the pretime since dt=posttime-pretime is always used below
00185 
00186     while (posttime_itr != itend) {
00187         dt = *posttime_itr - pretime;
00188         if (dt < -stdpmcfg_->cutoffD())
00189             break;
00190         // pre-spike causes depression
00191         stdpmcfg_->weight_change(weight, dt); // add contribution (dt < 0)
00192         ++posttime_itr; // move backwards
00193     }
00194 
00195     // Bounds:
00196     stdpmcfg_->check_bounds(weight);
00197 }
00198 
00200 // to update the synaptic weight (passed as a reference) when the postneuron fired
00201 template <class STDPFunction, class STDPBounds>
00202 template <class TypeImpl>
00203 inline void STDPMech<STDPFunction, STDPBounds>::on_postneuron_fire_plast_update(TypeImpl & neuron, const double & post_spike_time)
00204 {
00205     Time dt = - stdpmcfg_->cutoffD(); // meaningless initialisation, needed for tests using 'dt' later on
00206     double posttime = post_spike_time;
00207     double & weight = neuron.weight_impl();
00208     std::deque<Time>::const_reverse_iterator itend = neuron.preneuron_spike_list_impl().rend();
00209 
00210     // weight change due to firing rate
00211     weight += stdpmcfg_->w_out();
00212 
00213     // Locate the last spike of the preneuron:
00214     std::deque<Time>::const_reverse_iterator pretime_itr = neuron.preneuron_spike_list_impl().rbegin();
00215 
00216     //  check that there IS a last pre-spike:
00217     if (pretime_itr == itend)
00218         return;
00219 
00220     // skip the last pre-spike if it's later than posttime (can only happen once in current timestep):
00221     if (*pretime_itr >= post_spike_time)
00222         ++pretime_itr; // move backwards
00223 
00224     posttime -= neuron.delay_impl(); // equivalent to adding the delay to the pretime since dt=posttime-pretime is always used below
00225 
00226 //  while (pretime_itr != itend)
00227 //  {
00228 //      if (posttime - *pretime_itr > -stdpmcfg_->cutoffD()) // pre-spike too late to register any change
00229 //          break;
00230 //      ++pretime_itr;  // move backwards
00231 //  }
00232 
00233     while (pretime_itr != itend) {
00234         dt = posttime - *pretime_itr;
00235         if (dt > stdpmcfg_->cutoffP())
00236             break;
00237         // pre-spike causes potentiation
00238         stdpmcfg_->weight_change(weight, dt); // add contribution
00239         ++pretime_itr;  // move backwards
00240     }
00241 
00242     // Bounds:
00243     stdpmcfg_->check_bounds(weight);
00244 }
